additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Ingredients: Sugar, Milk Solids, Cocoa Butter^, Cocoa Mass^, Emulsifiers (Sunflower and Rapeseed Lecithin), Wheat Flour, Rice Starch, Colours (162, 160a, 100), Flavours, Plant Extract (Spirulina), Glazing Agents (901, 903), Barley Malt Extract. Contains Milk, Gluten, Wheat, Barley. May Contain Peanuts, Tree Nuts, Soy. Milk Chocolate Contains Minimum 30% Cocoa Solids and 24% Milk Solids. ^ Rainforest Alliance Certified Cocoa. Find Out More at Ra.Org.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Milk, Wheat and Barley. Milk chocolate contains minimum 30% cocoa solids and 24% milk solids.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Nuts, Contains Barley, May Be Present Peanuts, Contains Wheat, Contains Milk, Contains Cereals Containing Gluten

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Young children (less than 4 year) have limited chewing ability and could choke on small candies.

description: Three hollow Santa figures of milk chocolate, containing a colourful surprise inside. Your favourite Smarties with smooth milk chocolate, in a crisp colourful shell.
name: Smarties Chocolate Santa Face 3 Pack
